name: Grookey
description: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Grassy Surge
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.
abilities.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
